title: Amanda Cavallaro - How Firebase Helped Me Land My Dream Job

media:group.media:title: Amanda Cavallaro - How Firebase Helped Me Land My Dream Job
media:group.media:description:
Learn how the Firebase knowledge (in particular serverless functions) helped Amanda Cavallaro to speed up the prototyping and implementations of proof of concepts for talks and conferences and to ease the transition into her new role as a developer advocate in the cloud and communications sector.

Bio
Amanda Cavallaro is an Italo-Brazilian developer advocate @ Vonage. She is a Google Developers Expert for the Firebase, Assistant and ML Cloud Conversational AI categories, who is passionate about cloud technologies, JavaScript, human-computer interactions and ambient computing and a love of learning. You can speak to her in Portuguese, English, Italian and a little Japanese.

https://twitter.com/amdcavallaro

This talk is part of our DevFest Inspire event! #DevFestInspire

DevFest Inspire is a virtual event celebrating the end of the DevFest 2021 season where we’ll recognize content created by the community, as well as Googlers from Europe and Africa. 

You can also network and connect with other developers during the event! 
→ Learn more and sign up at https://goo.gle/devfest-inspire !
